DelliDRACCardService.description: The DelliDRACCardService resource provides some actions to support iDRAC configurations.
DelliDRACCardService.longDescription: The DelliDRACCardService resource provides some actions to support iDRAC configurations.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

ExportCertificate.description: This method is used to export the certificate from the idrac, based on input parameter CertificateType. ExportCertificate returns the certificate file path.
ExportCertificate.longDescription: This method is used to export the certificate from the idrac, based on input parameter CertificateType. ExportCertificate returns the certificate file path.

CertificateType.description: The type of the certificate to be exported.
CertificateType.longDescription: The type of the certificate to be exported.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ExportSSLCertificate.description: This method is used to export the ssl certificate from the idrac, based on input parameter Type. ExportSSLCertificate returns the certificate.
ExportSSLCertificate.longDescription: This method is used to export the ssl certificate from the idrac, based on input parameter Type. ExportSSLCertificate returns the certificate.

SSLCertType.description: The type of the certificate to be exported.
SSLCertType.longDescription: The type of the certificate to be exported.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

GenerateSEKMCSR.description: This method is used to create the SEKM certificate signing request(CSR) and return the certificate file. The certificate file should be signed by an authority. Note: For creating the CSR, the following DelliDRACCardString attributes under SEKMCert group must be configured. 1.CommonName, 2.OrganizationUnit, 3.LocalityName, 4.StateName, 5. CountryCode, 6. EmailAddress, 7.OrganizationName and optional attributes are 1.SubjectAltName 2.UserId.
GenerateSEKMCSR.longDescription: This method is used to create the SEKM certificate signing request(CSR) and return the certificate file. The certificate file should be signed by an authority. Note: For creating the CSR, the following DelliDRACCardString attributes under SEKMCert group must be configured. 1.CommonName, 2.OrganizationUnit, 3.LocalityName, 4.StateName, 5. CountryCode, 6. EmailAddress, 7.OrganizationName and optional attributes are 1.SubjectAltName 2.UserId.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ImportCertificate.description: This method is used to import the certificate to iDRAC, on the basis of input parameter CertificateType.
ImportCertificate.longDescription: This method is used to import the certificate to iDRAC, on the basis of input parameter CertificateType.

CertificateFile.description: A base 64 encoded string of the Certificate file.
CertificateFile.longDescription: A base 64 encoded string of the Certificate file.

CertificateType.description: Type of the certificate to be imported.
CertificateType.longDescription: Type of the certificate to be imported.

Instance.description: This parameter represent the instance number. Applicable only for CertificateType RSYSLOG_SERVER_CA and max 2 instance are allowed to store.
Instance.longDescription: This parameter represent the instance number. Applicable only for CertificateType RSYSLOG_SERVER_CA and max 2 instance are allowed to store.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ImportSSLCertificate.description: This method is used to import the ssl certificate to iDRAC, on the basis of input parameter Type. After importing the certificate, the iDRAC will automatically restart.
ImportSSLCertificate.longDescription: This method is used to import the ssl certificate to iDRAC, on the basis of input parameter Type. After importing the certificate, the iDRAC will automatically restart.

CertificateType.description: Type of the certificate to be imported.
CertificateType.longDescription: Type of the certificate to be imported.

Passphrase.description: A passphrase for certificate file. Note: This is optional parameter for CSC certificate, and not required for Server and CA certificates.
Passphrase.longDescription: A passphrase for certificate file. Note: This is optional parameter for CSC certificate, and not required for Server and CA certificates.

SSLCertificateFile.description: A base 64 encoded string of the XML Certificate file. Note: For importing CSC certificate, user has to convert PKCS file to base64 format. Use the openssl command. The CTC file content has to be in PEM format (base 64 encoded).
SSLCertificateFile.longDescription: A base 64 encoded string of the XML Certificate file. Note: For importing CSC certificate, user has to convert PKCS file to base64 format. Use the openssl command. The CTC file content has to be in PEM format (base 64 encoded).

JoinGroup.description: The method is used join an existing group providing the GroupPasscode.
JoinGroup.longDescription: The method is used join an existing group providing the GroupPasscode.

CloneConfiguration.description: Clones email alert configuration from the group once joined.0-Disable, 1-Enable.
CloneConfiguration.longDescription: Clones email alert configuration from the group once joined.0-Disable, 1-Enable.

GroupName.description: Name of the group to be joined.
GroupName.longDescription: Name of the group to be joined.

GroupPasscode.longDescription: Passcode of the group to be joined.

GroupUUID.description: Unique Identifier of the group to be joined.

TestRsyslogServerConnection.description: The TestRsyslogServerConnection() method is used to test rsylog connection from iDRAC, i.e Whether Test message from iDRAC is reaching to the the Rsyslog Listener or not .

iDRACReset.longDescription: This method is used to reset iDRAC .

iDRACResetCfg.description: This method is used to reset the iDRAC to factory default configurations.
iDRACResetCfg.longDescription: This method is used to reset the iDRAC to factory default configurations.

Force.description: This option is used to reset the iDRAC to factory defaults by force or gracefully.
Force.longDescription: This option is used to reset the iDRAC to factory defaults by force or gracefully.

Preserve.description: Preserve= 0 (Default)-reset all configuration to default except network and users. Preserve=1 (All)-reset all configuration to default including network and users. Preserve=2 (ResetAllWithRootDefaults)  - reset all configuration to default including network preserve default user as root calvin.
Preserve.longDescription: Preserve= 0 (Default)-reset all configuration to default except network and users. Preserve=1 (All)-reset all configuration to default including network and users. Preserve=2 (ResetAllWithRootDefaults)  - reset all configuration to default including network preserve default user as root calvin.
